thread.title: Kate Middleton reveals she is “filled with horror‎,” when Prince William rides his motorcycle
thread.title_full: Kate Middleton reveals she is “filled with horror‎,” when Prince William rides his motorcycle

author: contact@inrumor.com
title: Kate Middleton reveals she is “filled with horror‎,” when Prince William rides his motorcycle
text:
Tweet 
The Duchess of Cambridge, née Kate Middleton, recently revealed that she is “terrified” whenever Prince William rides his Ducati motorbike. 
On Friday the royal couple carried out a royal engagement in Dundee, the first in a series of several visits to the Scottish city, in order to join forces in the fight against the stigma surrounding mental health. 
During their appearance at the Scottish Mental Health Arts and Film Festival, a royal fan talked with Duchess Kate about her husband Prince William’s motorbike. 
“He’s still riding it,” the Duchess, 33, responded . “It always fills me with horror when he goes out on it. I’m terrified. Hopefully, I’m going to keep George off it.” 
Kensington Palace tweeted pictures of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge during their visit in Dundee. Thank you Dundee for giving such a wonderful welcome to The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge today! pic.twitter.com/p4qbZ6OZzs 
— Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) October 23, 2015 The Duke and Duchess are greeted by crowds @DundeeRep , where they will join their Family Fun Day pic.twitter.com/GFSnE8NwEE 
— Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) October 23, 2015 
On October 26, Kate, William and Harry will host a charities forum event at BAFTA. That same day, the royal trio will will attend the world premiere of the latest Bond movie, Spectre. Spread the rumor
